SQLLoaderMapping.name: Stump parameters
SQLLoaderMapping.fetch_sql:
SELECT
                SoftwoodTopProportion,
                SoftwoodStumpProportion,
                HardwoodTopProportion,
                HardwoodStumpProportion
            FROM tblAdminBoundaryDefault
            GROUP BY
                SoftwoodTopProportion,
                SoftwoodStumpProportion,
                HardwoodTopProportion,
                HardwoodStumpProportion
